Deprecated API

Contents

  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    com.composum.sling.clientlibs.servlet.DebugClientlibGraphServlet
    Not yet fully functional
    com.composum.sling.core.event.AbstractChangeObserver
    Please prefer to use the Sling mechanisms (ResourceListener) to the JCR mechanisms
    com.composum.sling.core.util.LinkCodec
    use UrlCodec codecs / LinkUtil methods
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    com.composum.sling.core.CoreConfigImpl.getLoginUrl​(String)
    com.composum.sling.core.CoreConfiguration.getLoginUrl​(String)
    com.composum.sling.core.CoreConfiguration.getLogoutUrl()
    com.composum.sling.core.ResourceHandle.setInheritanceType​(InheritedValues.Type)
    please prefer ResourceHandle.withInheritanceType(InheritedValues.Type) to keep this effectively immutable
    com.composum.sling.core.ResourceHandle.setUseNodeInheritance​(boolean)
    please use ResourceHandle.withInheritanceType(InheritedValues.Type) with InheritedValues.Type.sameContent to keep ResourceHandle effectively immutable.
    com.composum.sling.core.servlet.Status.withLogging​(Logger)
    rather use the constructor Status(SlingHttpServletRequest, SlingHttpServletResponse, Logger), Status(GsonBuilder, SlingHttpServletRequest, SlingHttpServletResponse, Logger) or, if need be, Status.setMessageLogger(Logger). This is kept for backwards compatibility for a while.
    com.composum.sling.core.SlingBean.initialize​(BeanContext, Resource)
    please use BeanContext.withResource(Resource).BeanContext.adaptTo(Class) with the needed SlingBean class to instantiate the object, since SlingBean.initialize(BeanContext, Resource) doesn't initialize fields injected by Sling-Models.
    com.composum.sling.core.util.HttpUtil.isModifiedSince​(long, Calendar)
    please use HttpUtil.notModifiedSince(long, Calendar) since that's cleaner; this will be removed soon
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    com.composum.sling.core.InheritedValues​(Resource, boolean)
    com.composum.sling.core.logging.Message()
    only for JSON deserialization.
    com.composum.sling.core.logging.MessageTypeAdapterFactory()
    since using explicitly makes little sense.
    com.composum.sling.core.servlet.Status​(Gson, SlingHttpServletRequest, SlingHttpServletResponse)
    since it's dangerous to forget #initGson(GsonBuilder, SlingHttpServletRequest).
    com.composum.sling.core.util.SlingUrl​(SlingHttpServletRequest, String)
    use new SlingUrl(request).fromUrl(url)
